SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE VIEW dbo.CoreGrids_Vw AS SELECT dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_Ky, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreEntities_Ky, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_Title, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_Order, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreModules_Ky, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_Custom, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_Default, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_SQLWhere, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_SQLOrder, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_SQLFrom, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Code, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Icon, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Icon, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Code, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Title, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreGrids_Rows, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Tree, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_TreeAttribute, dbo.CoreGrids.CoreForms_Ky, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Title, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Order, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Order, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Order, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Key, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Description, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_LabelSingular, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_LabelPlural, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Config, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Title, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_AdminMenuTitle, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_LabelSingular, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_LabelPlural, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Version, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Active, dbo.CoreForms.CoreEntities_Ky AS Expr1, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Custom, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Default, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_SQLFrom, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_WhichFields FROM dbo.CoreGrids INNER JOIN dbo.CoreEntities ON dbo.CoreGrids.CoreEntities_Ky = dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Ky INNER JOIN dbo.CoreModules ON dbo.CoreEntities.CoreModules_Ky = dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Ky LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CoreForms ON dbo.CoreGrids.CoreForms_Ky = dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Ky
